version_description:
● Fixed bugs with unlocking craft recipes
● Fixed problems with buttons on the iPad
● Fixed saves in creative mode
● The fishing rod does not break with a miss
● Increased inventory capacity
● Improved UI textures

• Rug
• Large and small garden where you can grow vegetables
• Carrot and cabbage seeds
• New types of fish
• Rainwater collector
• Large roasting pan where you can cook 3 fish at a time
• Asthenic trophy from fish or shark head,
• Pirate flag
• Big chest
• Metal fishing rod that lasts longer and catches big fish
• A metal spear that kills a shark after several attacks
• Gameplay changes and bug fixes

▸ Storyline
▸ New models & animation
▸ New types of food
▸ Shark behavior has been slightly modified
▸ New and modified old sounds
▸ New features in creative mode

▸ Storyline

▸ Shark behavior has been slightly modified
▸ New and modified old sounds
▸ New features in creative mode
▸ Minor bugs fixed
Shark is not so aggressive now. Thank discord community ;)
